name: Cyber City
description:
Wear a VR headset and immerse yourself in the world of the future.

Cyber city is an experience where the player moves around the city and needs to find the keys to open the next location. The last location leads to a space ship that will allow you to escape from the city.

Exploring the city to get the keys the player has to solve the puzzles.

Featured:

- CIty of the future
- unique music
- high quality 3d models
- Game designed for virtual reality with full support of roomscale
- Puzzles
